articles.title: Meetings Held to Elect Delegates to WPK Conference
articles.content:
Meetings Held to Elect Delegates to WPK Conference
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Meetings of the Cabinet, Korean People's Internal Security Forces, Ministry of Railways and Ministry of Culture were held to elect delegates to the Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present there were delegates elected at the party organizations at all levels of the Cabinet, the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, the Ministry of Railways and the Ministry of Culture.
					
					 The delegates paid silent tribute to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The meetings discussed the election of delegates to the WPK Conference.
					
					 Premier Choe Yong Rim, Ri Pyong Sam, director of the Political Bureau of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, Han Chang Nam, director of the Political Bureau of the Ministry of Railways, and Ri Myong Mo, chief secretary of the Party Committee of the Ministry of Culture, made addresses at the meetings on electing the dear respected Kim Jong Un as a delegate to the WPK Conference.
					
					 Kim Jong Il devoted great energies till the last moments of his life for the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's Korea and the happiness of its people and the triumphant advance of the cause of global independence, the addresses said, adding his revolutionary feats will shine for all ages.
					
					 To elect Kim Jong Un as a delegate to the WPK Conference is an expression of absolute trust and intense loyalty of all the party members and other working people of the Cabinet, the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, the Ministry of Railways and the Ministry of Culture, they noted.
					
					 He, the closest revolutionary comrade-in-arms and closest revolutionary comrade of Kim Jong Il, has remained true to his idea and leadership while traversing the road of the Songun revolution together with him from long ago and opened up a new chapter of immortalizing the leader with boundless loyalty and noble moral obligation towards him, they stressed.
					
					 The meetings courteously proposed to elect him as a delegate to the WPK Conference.
					
					 At the meetings the speakers fully supported and approved the proposal on electing him as a delegate to the WPK Conference.
					
					 The meetings unanimously adopted decisions on electing him as a delegate to the WPK Conference.
					
					 Delegates to the WPK Conference were elected at the meetings.

articles.title: Provincial and City Conferences of WPK Held to Elect Delegates to Its Conference
articles.content:
Provincial and City Conferences of WPK Held to Elect Delegates to Its Conference
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Conferences of South Hamgyong, Ryanggang, North Hamgyong and North Hwanghae Provinces and Nampho City of the Workers' Party of Korea to elect delegates to the WPK Conference were held.
					 Present there were delegates elected at the party organizations of cities and counties in the provinces and other units performing the same function as theirs' in the provinces and the party organizations of the provincial institutions.
					
					 The delegates paid silent tribute to General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The conferences discussed the election of delegates to the WPK Conference.
					
					 Addresses on electing the dear respected Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the WPK and the Korean people, as a delegate to the WPK Conference were made at the conferences.
					
					  The army and people of the DPRK are now dynamically pushing forward the general advance to successfully materialize the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il and effect a new turn in building a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, the addresses said, praising Kim Jong Il as the outstanding leader and peerlessly legendary great man who performed the undying feats on behalf of the country and the nation, the era and mankind. 
					
					 To elect Kim Jong Un as a delegate to the WPK Conference is the unanimous desire of all the party members and other people in the provinces and the city, they noted, adding that he was the great statesman who wisely led the revolution and construction as a whole with his tested leadership, possessed of distinguished quality and trait no one could match.
					
					 They courteously proposed to elect him as a delegate to the WPK Conference, representing the unanimous minds of all the party members and other people.
					
					 Speeches were made at the conferences.
					
					 The speakers fully supported and approved the proposal on electing him as a delegate to the WPK Conference.
					
					 They said in an excited tone that Kim Jong Un, boundlessly loyal to the idea and cause of Kim Jong Il, is, indeed, the supreme leader of the WPK and the army and people of the DPRK both in name and reality.
					
					They expressed their will to implement the behests of Kim Jong Il without even an inch of deviation and even a step of concession under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, thus positively contributing to accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of building a thriving nation.
					
					 The conferences unanimously adopted decisions on electing Kim Jong Un as a delegate to the WPK Conference, representing the unanimous will and desire of all the party members and other people in the provinces and the city.
					
					 The conferences elected delegates to the WPK Conference.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Campaign at "Nuclear Security Summit" Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Anti-DPRK Campaign at "Nuclear Security Summit" Assailed 
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Friday gave an answer to the question raised by KCNA as regards the frantic anti-DPRK confrontation racket kicked up by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors during the Seoul "nuclear security summit".
					  The Lee group kicked up during the summit a ridiculous anti-DPRK racket, pulling up the DPRK over its nuclear deterrence and its projected launch of satellite Kwangmyongsong-3, both irrelevant to the agenda of the summit, he said, and continued: 
					
					 It was a hideous provocation against the DPRK and shame on the nation that the Lee group worked hard to turn the summit into a platform for hatching a plot to escalate the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 It was a ridiculous tragicomedy for the Lee group to host "nuclear security summit" as it turned south Korea into the most dangerous nuclear arsenal, acting as a top-class nuclear war servant of the U.S.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak and his gentry made such desperate bid to "pressurize" the DPRK even during the summit though they are deader than alive, forsaken by the people in south Korea for their unpopular rule, sycophancy, treachery and anti-reunification and confrontation moves. How miserable their plight is. 
					
					 The DPRK's planned launch of working satellite so malignantly decried by the group is an exercise of an independent and legitimate right in line with the universally accepted international laws on the peaceful use of space including the Outer Space Treaty. 
					
					 The puppet group is now joining the U.S. in accusing the DPRK of its "violation of the UN resolutions" but the DPRK has never recognized such illegal resolutions disregarding its sovereignty and dignity. 
					
					 The persistent smear campaign being kicked up by Lee over the DPRK's nuclear deterrence and projected satellite launch cannot be construed otherwise than the last-ditch effort to get rid of the tight corner in which he is finding himself, isolated at home and abroad, justify his policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen, bridge over his ruling crisis and use it for the general election. 
					
					   Lee tried hard to raise sinking "status of south Korea" and turn people's mindset favorable to him through the summit. But it only brought to light his true colors as a colonial stooge and nuclear war servant of the U.S. and maniac keen on confrontation with compatriots. 
					
					 The above-said racket clearly proved that Park Geun Hye of the "Saenuri Party" calling for "change and revamp" and puppet Minister of Unification Ryu U Ik crying out for "flexibility" are heinous confrontation-minded elements as bad as Lee Myung Bak.
					
					 The world will watch with admiration Kwangmyongsong-3 flying in the space. 
					
					 Then all hues of faultfinders will realize they were wrong.

articles.title: National Meeting Held to Mark 30th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work "On the Juche Idea"
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Mark 30th Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Friday to mark the 30th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea".
					  The work, published on March 31, Juche 71 (1982), clarifies the immortal ideological and theoretical feats of President Kim Il Sung who founded the Juche idea and scientifically. It also theoretically systematizes the original principles and contents of the Juche idea.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Ho and other senior party, state and army officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, literature and arts,  public health and media, persons of distinguished services and working people in the city, overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front. 
					
					 All the participants paid silent tribute to Kim Jong Il in the humblest reverence. 
					
					 Kim Ki Nam, member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea, delivered a report at the meeting.
					
					 He said the work of Kim Jong Il is a monumental masterpiece to go down in the history of world politics in the light of the revolutionary and original character of the ideological and theoretical contents, philosophical depth and great theoretical and practical significance, and the library of the Juche idea which indicates the most correct way for carving out the destiny of the popular masses.
					
					 The past several decades since the publication of the work are a history of victory in which Kim Jong Il led the WPK, the army and the people, weathering all sorts of tempests of history, and thus made an undying contribution to the revolutionary cause of Juche and the cause of global independence, the reporter noted, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il steadily developed the Juche idea, Songun idea with profound principles and original contents in conformity with new requirements of revolutionary practice in our era and built the DPRK into a dignified political and ideological power and military power.
					
					 The reporter called upon all the party members, service personnel and people to hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages and glorify his immortal revolutionary idea and feats forever, bearing in minds the unwavering belief that he will always be alive with them.

articles.title: Renovated Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory Comes on Line
articles.content:
Renovated Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory Comes on Line
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory has been successfully renovated.
					 All the production processes ranging from the feed of raw materials to the packing of finished products form an integrated control system, making the factory an exemplary one in the new century and a model in the foodstuff industry.
					
					 The renovation helps lay a solid foundation for supplying the Pyongyang citizens with quality confectionery.
					
					 A ceremony for the completion took place on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Yong Rim, premier of the Cabinet, Mun Kyong Dok, chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who doubles as secretary of the WPK Central Committee, and officials concerned. 
					
					 The premier read a message of thanks sent by the WPK Central Committee to the employees of the factory and builders who made a good job in the modernization project.

articles.title: International Kim Il Sung Prize Conferred on Great King of Cambodia
articles.content:
International Kim Il Sung Prize Conferred on Great King of Cambodia
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- An event of conveying International Kim Il Sung Prize to Great King Norodom Sihanouk of Cambodia on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung was held with splendor in Phnom Penh on Thursday.
					 Present at the event were Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni, members of the royal family, Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, Khieu Kanharith, minister of Information, Him Chaem, minister of Culture and Arts, Chhorn Hay, Cambodian Ambassador to DPRK, Johnny Hon, chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation, and his party, members of the DPRK government delegation led by Kim Chang Ryong, councilor of the Foreign Ministry, Hong Ki Chol, DPRK ambassador to Cambodia, and a staff member of his embassy.
					
					 The chairman of the International Kim Il Sung Foundation handed the diploma, medal and souvenir to King Norodom Sihamoni authorized by Great King Norodom Sihanouk.
					
					 Speeches were made at the event.
					
					 The king said he was pleased to receive the International Kim Il Sung Prize awarded to the great king on the occasion of the centenary of the birth of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 This gives us a good opportunity of boosting the ties of friendship and solidarity between Cambodia and the DPRK, the king added, and continued:
					
					 Taking this opportunity, I pay highest tribute to His Excellency Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 His Excellency the great General Secretary Kim Jong Il will always be remembered by the Korean and other people of the world. 
					
					 I sincerely wish His Excellency Kim Jong Un, the supreme leader of the party, army and people of the DPRK, good health and fresh success in the noble cause of nation-building and national defense.
					
					 I wish the dearest and fraternal Korean people peace, progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Cambodian King Wishes Kim Jong Un Greater Success
articles.content:
Cambodian King Wishes Kim Jong Un Greater Success 
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni met and had a talk with the visiting DPRK government delegation led by Kim Chang Ryong, councilor of the Foreign Ministry, at the Royal Palace on March 29.
					 The king sincerely wished the dear respected Kim Jong Un good health and greater success in his noble cause of leading the DPRK.

articles.title: Citations Conferred on People of Merits in DPRK
articles.content:
Citations Conferred on People of Merits in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Citations were conferred on officials and other working people in the key domains and basic industrial field who rendered meritorious services to the building of a thriving nation in the run-up to the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Citations of watches bearing the august name of Kim Il Sung went to seven persons.
					
					 Order of National Flag First Class was conferred on ten persons, Order of Labor on 25, Order of National Flag Second Class on 127, Order of National Flag Third Class on 215 and Medal of Merit on 151.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on March 29.

articles.title: University Student Scientific Research Prize Awarded in DPRK
articles.content:
University Student Scientific Research Prize Awarded in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Certificates and medals of University Student Scientific Research Prize were awarded to 740 odd students in the DPRK.
					 They contributed to solving technological problems arising in  worksites of economic sectors. They are also known for studying hard to acquire cutting-edge science and technology and conducting untiring activities for scientific researches. 
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the hall of the youth league on Friday.

articles.title: New Korean Feature Film Produced
articles.content:
New Korean Feature Film Produced
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A Korean feature film "Little Girl Presenting Wild Flowers" was produced.
					 The film is based on the true story about a little girl who deeply impressed General Secretary Kim Jong Il as she placed a bunch of wild flowers with best wishes before the monument to on-the-spot guidance in June 1996, missing President Kim Il Sung very much.
					
					 Heroine Jong Hui devoted herself to training from the very day she joined the Korean People's Army, bearing deep in mind the great loving care Kim Jong Il showed for her by praising her deed in her childhood and made her known to the whole country as "a little girl presenting wild flowers."
					
					 Through the portrayal of the genuine and simple soldier standing firm guard over her post, always bearing deep in mind the honor of pleasing Kim Jong Il, the film impressively tells where the worth of living of the soldiers in the Songun era is.

articles.title: Vitality of Juche Idea Demonstrated before World
articles.content:
Vitality of Juche Idea Demonstrated before World
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- 30 years have passed since the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" on March 31, 1982.
					 The work was brought out in pamphlet by political parties, organizations and institutions of more than 140 countries in less than a year after its publication.
					
					 The famous works of Kim Jong Il, a library of the Juche idea, including "On the Juche Idea" were translated into more than 60 different languages and published in more than 190 countries over the past three decades.
					
					 The Juche idea has been studied and disseminated on a global scale since the 1960s and its study groups appeared in various parts of the world.
					
					 More than 100 study groups go by the august name of Kim Jong Il and tens of thousands of seminars on the Juche idea were held.
					
					 The publication of his famous works got brisk. More than 540 000 copies of his works including "Let Us Advance under the Banner of Marxism-Leninism and the Juche Idea" and "Socialism Is a Science" were brought out in many countries in more than 40 different languages in the latter half of the 1990s.
					
					Among the works on Songun politics widely published were "Songun Politics of Our Party Is an Effective Socialist Political Mode" and "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" which comprehensively deal with the principles and theories of the Songun revolution based on the Juche idea.
					
					 Those works were published in more than 20 different languages and distributed in at least 30 countries last year alone.
					
					 The study and dissemination of the Juche idea were organized on a global scale. The first study organization of the Juche idea was formed in Mali in April 1969 and there came into being the International Institute of the Juche Idea in 1978.
					
					 More than 50 study organizations were formed in 1982 alone and the African Regional Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the European Society for the Study of the Juche Idea were founded in 1985. There is a well-organized system for studying and disseminating the Juche idea in different continents, countries and regions.
					
					 International and continental seminars on the Juche idea were organized nearly 20 times in the 1980s.
					
					 In Asia national seminars were held more than 100 times in 36 countries and various forms of international and national seminars took place more than 2,900 times in a year of the 1990s.
					
					 In the new century the Juche idea was studied and disseminated in various forms and methods more than 9 000 times in at least 180 countries and regions. 
					
					 A new method of studying and disseminating the Juche idea by use of internet was applied.
					
					 The 13th Enlarged Meeting of the Executive Committee of the Board of Directors of the International Institute of the Juche Idea adopted a decision to hold a world conference on the Juche idea in Pyongyang in April this year, the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The Tower of the Juche Idea, unveiled on April 15, 1982, has been visited by at least 480,000 foreigners of nearly 52,000 delegations over the last three decades.
					
					 Nearly 320 pieces of commemorative stones were contributed by more than 80 countries and international organizations.
					
					 All facts go to prove that the Juche idea has tremendous vitality and the trend of the times to follow this great idea grows stronger with the flow of time.

articles.title: "Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (15)
articles.content:
"Kim Il Sung's Korea", Special Write-ups to Centenary of His Birth (15)
Kim Il Sung, Founder of Korean-style Socialist State
					
					 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was a peerlessly great man who explored the road for building a socialist state centered on the popular masses for the first time in history.
					
					 He had devoted all his life to building and strengthening the Korean-style socialism centered on the people to translate their desire for independence into reality.
					
					 Regarding the love for the people as his lifelong motto, he founded the Juche Idea, based on the idea of believing in the people as in Heaven, and opened up a new era of building a socialist state in Korea.
					
					 He had always given priority to the desire and demands of the people in adopting every line and policy of the government and worked hard to carry them into practice.
					
					 After Korea's liberation from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule, he drew out and promulgated the agrarian reform law, taking into consideration the cherished desire of peasantry to become owner of land. He also advanced the policy of agricultural cooperativization on reorganizing the rural economic form in a socialist way before the technical transformation to meet the people's demand and wishes.
					
					 In this way all the lines and policies of the Workers' Party of Korea adopted under the guidance of the President reflected the people's will and requirements. They include the basic line of socialist economic construction, the keynote of which was to give priority to building heavy industry while developing light industry and agriculture simultaneously, the line of simultaneously building up the economy and defenses and the line of the three revolutions, ideological, technological and cultural.
					
					 The President led the building of a socialist state to victory, always sharing sweets and bitters with the people and enlisting their unfailing energy.
					
					 He always placed faith in the people and inspired them with confidence in sure victory. Under his wise guidance, the DPRK turned into a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Regarding it as his greatest pleasure to be with the people, he made ceaseless journey of field guidance, in disregard of bad weather conditions and holidays, to provide them with a happy life.
					
					 He devoted his whole life to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people and brought about tremendous changes in the country, turning adversity into prosperity and misfortune into blessing.
					
					 The Korean people will always glorify the great feats of President Kim Il Sung, who made a new history of single-minded unity and built the people-centered socialist country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Dangerous Nature of U.S. Asia-Pacific Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Dangerous Nature of U.S. Asia-Pacific Policy
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The United States describes its policy of attaching importance to the Asia-Pacific as one for ensuring the regional "security and prosperity" and developing the "relations of cooperation" among the regional nations. But the policy is not for the regional nations. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The core of the U.S. Asia-Pacific policy is a strategy for national defence, says the article, adding:
					
					 It is the keynote of the U.S. Asia-Pacific strategy to head off the emergence of challenging "dangerous forces" and powers by dint of military advantages and expand the scope of its hegemony.
					
					 The triangular military alliance on which the U.S. pins great hopes serves as a military means for realizing the strategy.
					
					 The purpose sought by the U.S., south Korea and Japan in regularly staging joint military exercises is to hold a military hegemony over the Asia-Pacific region, contain and press powers and rein in and stifle "potential rivals" with collective military actions. 
					
					 The U.S. reinforcement of its armed forces and its tightened triangular military alliance in the Asia-Pacific region deserve caution from other big powers in the region.
					
					 The U.S. troops armed with nuclear weapons have been put on constant combat standby so that they can enter operations at any time.
					
					 The U.S. made south Korea a priority in its nuclear strategy aimed at holding military hegemony over the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					 It seeks to contain powers with an overwhelming number of nuclear weapons and advance the realization of the strategy.
					
					 The situation calls for sharpening the vigilance against the U.S. strategy to defend the peace and security of the Asia-Pacific region.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Stage Large-scale Joint Landing Exercise
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korea Stage Large-scale Joint Landing Exercise
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggressor forces and troops of the Marine Corps of the south Korean puppet army staged a large-scale joint landing exercise in Phohang, North Kyongsang Province on Thursday.
					 Involved in it were nearly 10,000 troops including at least 6,000 U.S. troops in Japan.
					
					 The warmongers deployed landing craft in waters off Phohang and staged the saber-rattling, sending landing vehicles to the shore in succession.
					
					 They staged the largest-ever landing exercise since the Team Spirit joint military exercises in 1989, openly advertising it as a drill under the simulated conditions of contingency on the Korean Peninsula.   
					
					 This is a clear indication of their wild ambition to invade the DPRK.

articles.title: Japan's Chief Executive Denounced for Distorting Past Crimes: S. Koreans
articles.content:
Japan's Chief Executive Denounced for Distorting Past Crimes: S. Koreans
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Yun Mi Hyang, permanent representative of the council for a solution to the issue of the volunteers corps in south Korea and its co-representative Han Kuk Yom issued a statement on March 27 denouncing the Japanese chief executive for distorting past crimes committed by Japan.
					 The Japanese prime minister said at a budget committee of the House of Councilors on March 26 that the expression "sexual slavery of Japanese army" is incorrect, the statement noted.
					
					 Officials of the Japanese government including the prime minister have vied with each other to instigate the right-wing reactionaries in Japan to kick up reckless acts against history and human rights, while distorting the essence of the past crimes, it said.
					
					 The statement urged Japan to open to public at an early date all information related to the sexual slavery system, admit the past crimes and make a formal apology and reparation for them.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak "government" should urge Japan to make legal reparation, regarding the reckless behavior of the Japanese prime minister as a serious issue, it noted.

articles.title: Day of Sun Commemorated by United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan
articles.content:
Day of Sun Commemorated by United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan 
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan held a photo exhibition at the Korean Center in Bishkek on March 23 to commemorate the centenary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 Displayed there were photos of immortal feats the President and General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed in the struggle for the country's reunification and the overseas compatriots movement and photos of progress made by Songun Korea.
					
					 Present there were officials of the confederation and other Koreans, the charge d'affaires ad interim of the DPRK embassy and members of the delegation of the Committee for Overseas Koreans.
					
					 Pak Kyong Ho, chairman of the confederation, made a speech.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The President was an outstanding thinker and theoretician, genius of leadership and the father of the people, possessed of the modest and noble personality.
					
					 His idea and feats are displaying their great vitality with the flow of the time and they will serve as a banner indicating the road to be followed by mankind forever.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Lives in Hearts of Progressive Mankind
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Lives in Hearts of Progressive Mankind
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Union Solidarity and Development Party, Union of Myanmar on Mar. 23 visited the DPRK embassy in Myanmar in the run-up to the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The delegation paid silent tribute to portraits of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il after presenting a floral basket in the name of the party.
					
					 Secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the party Aye Myint, head of the delegation, said: Kim Il Sung built Korean style socialism centered on the popular masses through his extraordinary ideological and theoretical activities and rendered everlasting services to global independence. He was, indeed, a great leader and ever-victorious iron-willed brilliant commander.
					
					 His revolutionary cause had been successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Il and today the dear respected Kim Jong Un, identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, is wisely leading the revolution along the path of victory.
					
					 Kim Il Sung would remain alive in the hearts of the progressive humankind, the secretary stressed.

articles.title: Indian National Seminar Held on Day of Sun
articles.content:
Indian National Seminar Held on Day of Sun
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- An Indian national seminar on the theme of "Self-reliance is a fundamental guarantee for sovereignty and world peace" was held in New Delhi on March 24 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present there were figures of all social standings and members of Juche idea study organizations of India and officials of the International Institute of the Juche Idea (IIJI) and the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea (ARIJI). Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to India and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 The floor was taken by the national secretary of the Indian National Congress Party, the director general of the IIJI, the secretary general of the All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association who is member of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of India (Marxist), the vice-president of Rajasthan University, the director general of the ARIJI and others.
					
					 The speakers said that Kim Il Sung who embarked upon the road of revolution in his early years founded the immortal Juche idea, applied the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance in practice and thus turned the DPRK into a socialist country centred on the popular masses.
					
					 They praised General Secretary Kim Jong Il for pursuing his original Songun politics, thereby shattering all challenges of the imperialists and their moves for aggression and putting the DPRK on the position of a nuclear weapons state and the state capable of manufacturing and launching satellite.
					
					 The revolutionary spirit of self-reliance is clearly indicating the road to be followed by the people of developing countries, they noted, stressing the need for mankind to hold high the banner of the Juche idea which reliably guarantees the independent development of each country and the world peace.
					
					 A letter to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birth Anniversary Commemorated by Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Germany and Bangladesh issued bulletins on March 21 and 22 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Germany-DPRK Association in its bulletin carried the portrait of a smiling Kim Il Sung. It edited an article titled "President Kim Il Sung and his feats" with a photo of his old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 The bulletin dealt in detail with the fact that he devoted his whole life to the liberation of the country and the freedom and happiness of its people, made the reunification of the country a primary task of the nation and put forward the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo.
					
					 The Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee in its bulletin carried an article titled "Among the people".
					
					 As he found himself among the people all his life, the President knew well about the wishes of the Korean people and the specific conditions of Korea and led the revolution and construction to victory with encyclopedic knowledge, the article said.
					
					 He is always alive in the hearts of the Korean people as he covered the history of victory and glory, going among the people all his life, it stressed.

articles.title: DPRK, Full-fledged Nuclear Weapons State: Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
DPRK, Full-fledged Nuclear Weapons State: Peruvian Organization
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Committee for Solidarity with Peoples released a statement on March 25 in support of the DPRK's planned satellite launch.
					 The DPRK made clear the peaceful and scientific purposes of its satellite launch, informed international bodies of it in advance and is pushing forward the preparations in line with international regulations and practices, the statement said.
					
					 Nevertheless, the U.S., south Korea, Japan and other hostile forces are taking issue with the DPRK's satellite launch, describing it as a missile launch, it noted, adding this is part of their anti-DPRK movements. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The hostile forces are still persisting in the anti-DPRK moves over the satellite launch and nuclear issue.
					
					 It is a universally recognized fact that the cause of and blame for the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula rest with the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet clique.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers should have a clear understanding of the DPRK and give up their anti-DPRK moves.
					
					 The DPRK is a full-fledged nuclear weapons state. We fully support the DPRK's plan for launching the satellite for peaceful purposes.

articles.title: Koryo Medicine of DPRK Introduced by Voice of Russia
articles.content:
Koryo Medicine of DPRK Introduced by Voice of Russia
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Voice of Russia on March 24 made a report titled "Koryo medicine helps retain youthfulness".
					 The Koryo Medicine Center is one of oriental medicine hospitals built in Russia, it said, adding Koryo medicine is very popular in Russia.
					
					 Pilots, actors and actresses and medical doctors of Russia, who received medical treatment at the center, recognized the efficiency of Koryo medicine, it noted, and went on:
					
					 Koryo medicine cures diseases related to the heart blood vessel system and the central nervous system which are considered to be difficult to cure by modern medicine. Once received Koryo medical treatment, one can retain one's labor ability, vigor and vitality for a long period.
					
					 The center has treated children's diseases from long ago amid deep trust.
					
					 The Central Pediatric Hospital of Russia often sends patients who contracted cerebral palsy, whom it considers difficult to handle, to this center. The results are surprising. Young patients are cured very rapidly, starting to toddle and speak soon enough to catch up with their age-fellows.

articles.title: Articles on KNA Posted in Websites of Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Articles on KNA Posted in Websites of Foreign Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Brazil and Nigeria posted on their Internet homepages articles on the occasion of the 95th anniversary of the Korean National Association (KNA).
					 The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK on March 22 posted on its Internet homepage an article titled "Untrodden Path" with a picture of Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter.
					
					 Kim Hyong Jik, basing himself on the idea of Jiwon (aim high), conducted the patriotic educational activities and pushed forward the work to rally comrades and form KNA, an anti-Japanese underground revolutionary organization, largest in scale and most transparent in the anti-imperialist independent stand at that time, the article said.
					
					 The KNA formation made it possible for the Koreans' anti-Japanese national liberation movement to set a correct fighting goal and open up a new phase for achieving the unity of the anti-Japanese patriotic forces, it stressed.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea on its Internet homepage on March 21 dealt with the formation of KNA by Kim Hyong Jik. It went on:
					
					 Though he passed away so early while devotedly struggling for the development of the Koreans' anti-Japanese national liberation movement, the idea of Jiwon, the idea of getting prepared for death from hunger, death from a beating and death from the cold, the idea of rallying comrades and two pistols left by him became the precious ideological and moral assets of the Korean revolution.
					
					 The feats of Kim Hyong Jik, who brought the dawn of modern Korea while covering the un-trodden path of history, will shine long with prospering socialist Korea.
					
					 The International Alliance of Societies for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Policy in East European and Central Asian Regions posted on its Internet homepage on March 23 an article titled "Idea of national independence which hewed out the new era of history" with his photo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Swiss Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Swiss Organization
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The full text of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution" was posted on Internet homepage of the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on March 22.
					 The work, published on January 29, 2003, clarifies the idea that the Songun revolutionary line, the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea, is a powerful political mode in the present era which carried forward and developed President Kim Il Sung's idea and line of giving importance to the army, and a scientific revolutionary line and political mode that most correctly reflects the requirements of the times and the revolution.
					
					 It also deals with the validity, advantages and great vitality of Songun politics.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Carried by Nepali Paper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Reminiscences Carried by Nepali Paper
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- "Revolutionary Comrade-in-arms Zhang Wei-hua" (1,2) from Chapter 12 of Vol. 4 of Part 1 Anti-Japanese Revolution of President Kim Il Sung's reminiscences "With the Century" was carried in a series by the Nepali paper Majodur from March 16 to 18.
					 It carried a photo of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried in Bulletin of German Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Brief Biography Carried in Bulletin of German Organization
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The Germany-DPRK Association on March 21 carried the brief biography of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The bulletin carried the portrait of a smiling Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: U.S. Dollar Loses Credit in World Financial Market
articles.content:
U.S. Dollar Loses Credit in World Financial Market
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The U.S. dollar system that dominated the world financial market is on the verge of collapse.
					 As already known, the U.S. economy has been on the downturn since the financial crisis that hit the country in 2008 swept across the world, resulting in the depreciation of dollar as the world reserve currency.
					
					 It was proved by the announcement by the S&P, the international credit-evaluation body, that it would lower the U.S. credit level.
					
					 This prompted many countries to opt to decrease their dependence on the unstable U.S. dollar and positively promote the use of their national currencies.
					
					 Premier of the State Council of China Wen Jiabao, making a report on the work of the government at the 5th Meeting of the 11th Chinese National People's Congress, said the government expanded nationwide the scope of settlement of accounts in RMB.Y in foreign trade as well as in the direct foreign investment and other fields of investment.
					
					 In last December, China made a decision on changing from the U.S. dollar to RMB.Y in the settlement of accounts in trade with Japan. Recently it struck a 10 billion Yuan worth swap agreement with Mongolia.
					
					 It also concluded similar agreements totaling 1.3 trillion Yuan with 16 countries and regions since the 2008 financial crisis.
					
					 Member states of the ALBA have formally used the common currency "Sucre" as a trade currency among them since 2010 and look forward to applying it to all other nations of Latin America. 
					
					 Member nations of the BRICS, namely Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa, are planning to fix RMB.Y as the common currency at a summit to be held in India.
					
					 It is a clear proof of the U.S. dollar losing its influence. 
					
					 The U.S. dollar system does not prove effective in inflicting monetary sanctions on Iran.
					
					 The U.S. thwarted Iran, one of major oil exports in the world, in using the existing financial system in payment for oil with other nations and forced countries in Europe and other parts of the world not to import the Iranian oil. 
					
					 But China and India that make up 40 percent of Iran's total oil exports expressed their willingness to continue importing the Iranian oil. 
					
					 In response to the U.S. and the West's financial sanctions, China and India have paid for the oil in gold or their national currencies in line with agreements with Iran. 
					
					 Now surfacing between the U.S. and newly emerging nations is difference in opinions over the nomination of a new president of the World Bank.
					
					 China, Brazil and other newly emerging nations proposed to nominate a presidential candidate from developing countries, free from the U.S. hereditary practice.
					
					 The World Bank reluctantly declared on Mar. 23 that it would nominate president from three proposed candidates.

articles.title: Asian Countries Cooperate
articles.content:
Asian Countries Cooperate
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The presidents of Tajikistan, Iran, Pakistan and Afghanistan on March 25 agreed to join in the drive to vitalize economic cooperation, oppose terrorism and extremism and ensure the regional security.
					 On March 24 Tajikistan and Iran discussed the issue of boosting bilateral cooperation in the economic field.

articles.title: Three Palestinians Wounded in Israeli Raid
articles.content:
Three Palestinians Wounded in Israeli Raid
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Three Palestinians were wounded Tuesday during clashes in the West Bank, a media report said.
					 The clashes broke out during an Israeli army raid in Ramon village near the central city of Ramallah.
					
					 The Israeli forces stormed a house in order to arrest the three Palestinians.

articles.title: NATO Soldier Killed in Afghan Blast
articles.content:
NATO Soldier Killed in Afghan Blast
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- A NATO soldier was killed Tuesday in a bomb blast in restive southern Afghanistan, a media report said.
					 Tuesday's attack brings to 92 the number of NATO soldiers killed in Afghanistan so far this year.

articles.title: UK Paper Discloses Israeli Anti-Iran Moves
articles.content:
UK Paper Discloses Israeli Anti-Iran Moves 
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- The British paper Sunday Times on March 25 exposed Israeli moves against Iran.
					 According to the paper, Israel has conducted covert operations for monitoring nuclear and military bases of Iran in recent years to spy its nuclear program and infiltrated its special units into the territory of Iran on a regular basis.

articles.title: Chinese FM Spokesman Rejects U.S. Interference in Its Internal Affairs
articles.content:
Chinese FM Spokesman Rejects U.S. Interference in Its Internal Affairs
 Beijing, March 29 (KCNA) -- Hong Lei, a spokesman for the Chinese Foreign Ministry, in a press conference on Wednesday, scathingly condemned the U.S. for its moves to interfere in the internal affairs of China. 
					 The Foreign Relations Committee of the U.S. Senate on March 27 adopted a resolution on Tibet and abused China's policy on it. In this connection Hong voiced China's stand of resolutely opposing some U.S. senators' acts of confusing right and wrong and interfering in the internal affairs of China under the pretext of the Tibet issue.
					
					 China demands U.S. congressmen see through the fact, drop prejudice and stop all acts of interfering in the internal affairs of China, Hong stressed.

articles.title: Armed Interference Is Intolerable: Medvedev
articles.content:
Armed Interference Is Intolerable: Medvedev
 Moscow, March 29 (KCNA) -- Dmitri Anatoliyevich Medvedev, president of Russia, recently said the armed interference of alien forces can not be allowed.
					 He denounced foreign forces for letting loose a spate of remarks of officially threatening armed interference in other countries. He termed them extremely dangerous and unpardonable trend.
					
					 This should be handled at war related trial, he said, pointing out that forcing one's ideas on the other is not compatible with the principles of international law.

articles.title: China Opposes Japan's Unilateral Actions Concerning Diaoyu Islands
articles.content:
China Opposes Japan's Unilateral Actions Concerning Diaoyu Islands
 Beijing, March 29 (KCNA) -- China voiced opposition to Japan's latest move concerning the Diaoyu Islands on Tuesday, stressing that Japan's unilateral actions are "illegal" and "invalid."
					The remarks came after Japanese Chief Cabinet Secretary Osamu Fujimura said Monday that Japan has registered one of the four islands near the Diaoyu Islands as a national asset.
					
					"Any unilateral actions adopted by the Japanese side concerning the Diaoyu Islands and their affiliated isles are illegal and invalid,"  Chinese Foreign Ministry spokesman Hong Lei said at a routine press briefing. 
					
					 China holds an indisputable sovereignty over them, Hong said, stressing "China will continue to take necessary measures to firmly safeguard sovereignty over the Diaoyu Islands and the affiliated isles".

articles.title: Radioactive Water Flows into Sea from Fukushima Nuclear Plant
articles.content:
Radioactive Water Flows into Sea from Fukushima Nuclear Plant
 Pyongyang, March 30 (KCNA) -- Water contaminated with highly concentrated radioactive substances flew from the crippled Fukushima Nuclear Power Plant of Japan.
					 The water leaked from a pipe in the plant flew into sea, Tokyo Electric Power Co. said on Monday. 
					
					 Each cubic centimeter of the contaminated water contained about 140,000 Bq of radioactive strontium and the amount of the leaked water was estimated to be almost 120 metric tons.

articles.title: Iranian President Condemns U.S. Hostile Policy
articles.content:
Iranian President Condemns U.S. Hostile Policy
 Tehran, March 29 (KCNA) -- Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, addressing an international meeting on March 26, condemned the U.S. for its hostile policy toward regional countries.
					 Such countries as Afghanistan are suffering misfortune and pain due to the U.S. wrong policy, he said, adding that the U.S.-led NATO troops' continued presence in the region under the pretext of "anti-terrorism" is increasing the regional instability.
					
					 Only when the NATO troops including the U.S. forces vacate Afghanistan, will drug-related crimes and terrorist acts be terminated, he noted.

articles.title: Sesionadas reuniones de delegados de las provincias y ciudad del PTC
articles.content:
Sesionadas reuniones de delegados de las provincias y ciudad del PTC
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar las reuniones de delegados de las provincias de Hamgyong del Norte y del Sur, de Ryanggang, de Hwanghae del Norte y la ciudad de Nampho para elegir a los delegados a la Conferencia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					A las ocasiones asistieron los delegados elegidos en las organizaciones del partido en las ciudades y distritos de las respectivas provincias y las del partido que cumplen la misma funcion y las otras del partido de las instituciones de nivel provincial.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					Los foros discutieron el tema de la eleccion de los delegados a la Conferencia del PTC.
					
					Hubo discursos que propusieron al Maximo Dirigente del PTC y el pueblo Kim Jong Un como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que hoy dia, bajo la guia del Maximo Dirigente, el ejercito y el pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea aceleran energicamente la marcha general para registrar nuevo viraje en la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista cumpliendo la idea y la causa del Dirigente.
					
					Elogiaron al Dirigente como destacado dirigente y gran hombre leyendario quien acumulo imborrables hazanas ante la patria, la nacion, la epoca y la humanidad.
					
					Destacaron que la eleccion del Maximo Dirigente como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC es el unanime deseo de todos los militantes del partido y otros habitantes de las provincias y la ciudad.
					
					Enfatizaron que el es gran politico que con su inigualable habilidad y nobles virtudes, dirige sabiamente todas las esferas de la revolucion y la construccion.
					
					Los oradores propusieron cortesmente elegir al Maximo Dirigente como delegado a la Conferencia del PTC en reflejo de la voluntad unanime de todos los militantes del partido y habitantes.
					
					Seguidamente, intervinieron otros.
					
					Ellos apoyaron absolutamente esa propuesta recalcando que Kim Jong Un, infinitamente fiel a la idea y la causa de Kim Jong Il, es el Maximo Dirigente del PTC, el ejercito y el pueblo de Corea.
					
					Expresaron la determinacion de contribuir activamente al cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de construccion del Estado prospero, al materializar consecuentemente el legado del Dirigente bajo la orientacion del Maximo Dirigente.
					
					En las ocasiones fueron aprobadas por unanimidad las resoluciones correspondientes en reflejo de la voluntad y deseo comunes de todos los militantes y habitantes de las provincias y la ciudad.
					
					A continuacion, fueron electos otros delegados a la Conferencia del PTC.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia campana anti-RPDC lanzada durante cumbre de Seul
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia campana anti-RPDC lanzada durante cumbre de Seul
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) --  En relacion con que la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak lanzo una demencial campana anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea durante la "Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear" efectuada en Seul, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) concedio el dia 29 una rueda de prensa con la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea, a la cual dio la siguiente respuesta:
					Durante la cumbre, la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak cuestiono tenazmente el disuasivo nuclear y el plan de lanzamiento del satelite artificial "Kwangmyongsong-3" de la RPDC, temas enajenados de la agenda de cumbre.
					
					Es una brutal provocacion contra la RPDC y una verguenza nacional la intencion de la camarilla de Lee de convertir esa reunion internacional en un debate para la confrontacion fratricida entre ambas partes coreanas.
					
					Es una tragicomedia que ellos, que convirtieron el suelo surcoreano en el arsenal nuclear mas grande y peligroso del mundo ofreciendose como lacayos de Estados Unidos para la guerra nuclear, hayan auspiciado la llamada "Cumbre de Seguridad Nuclear".
					
					El traidor Lee Myung Bak, que perdio la aprobacion popular en casa por su politica antipopular, servilismo a grandes potencias y acciones anti-reunificacion, y sus compinches trataron esta vez de ejercer presion a alguien.
					
					El plan de lanzamiento de satelite artificial de la RPDC, criticado con rabia por ellos, resulta el ejercicio del derecho independiente y legitimo que conviene totalmente a las universales leyes internacionales sobre el uso del cosmos con fines pacificos, inclusive el Tratado Espacial.
					
					Ellos y su amo norteamericano hablan tanto de la supuesta "violacion de la resolucion de la ONU". Pero, la RPDC nunca ha reconocido esa ilegal e ilegitima resolucion en su contra que desprecia la soberania y dignidad suyas.
					
					El traidor Lee Myung Bak censuro obstinadamente el disuasivo nuclear y el plan de lanzamiento de satelite artificial de la RPDC como su ultimo esfuerzo desesperado por salir del atolladero, en que cayo en el ambito interno y externo, justificar su politica de enfrentamiento fratricida, reparar la crisis del "poder" y malemplear esos temas en las elecciones generales.
					
					A traves de la presente cumbre, Lee intento elevar el "nivel del Estado" caido al suelo y recuperar la aceptacion popular, pero no hizo otra cosa que exponer su fachada de lacayo colonial de EE.UU. y maniaco de enfrentamiento fratricida.
					
					Ademas se hizo evidente que son elementos conflictivos identicos a el Park Geun-hye del "Partido Saenuri", que aboga por el "cambio" y la "renovacion", y Ryu U Ik, ministro de Reunificacion, que preconiza la "flexibilidad".
					
					Pronto, todo el mundo vera con admiracion al orgulloso "Kwangmyongsong-3" subiendo impetuosamente al espacio.
					
					En ese momento, los criticadores se daran cuenta del caracter injusto de su difamacion.

articles.title: Acto central por 30o aniversario de publicacion de "Sobre la idea Juche"
articles.content:
Acto central por 30o aniversario de publicacion de "Sobre la idea Juche"
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 30 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el acto central dedicado al 30o aniversario de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Sobre la idea Juche", publicada el 31 de marzo del 71 (1982) de la Era Juche.
					  Este trabajo enumera las imborrables proezas ideo-teoricas del Presidente Kim Il Sung, creador de la idea Juche, y sistematiza en lo cientifico-teorico los originales principios y componentes de ese pensamiento.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes Kim Yong Nam, Choe Yong Rim, Ri Yong Hoy otros cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado y el ejercito, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los funcionarios de las instituciones de ciencia, educacion, literatura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los hombres benemeritos, trabajadores capitalinos, compatriotas en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					  Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					  En el informe, Kim Ki Nam, miembro del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, subrayo que "Sobre la idea Juche" es la obra monumental que brillara siempre en la historia de la politica mundial gracias al caracter revolucionario y original de su contenido ideo-teorico y a la profundidad filosofica y gran significacion teorico-practica.
					
					Igualmente, resulta la enciclopedia de la idea Juche que ensena a las masas populares la mas justa ruta para forjar su destino, acoto.
					
					  Prosiguio que durante varias decadas desde la publicacion de la obra, el Dirigente condujo a la victoria al partido, ejercito y pueblo coreanos superando todas las pruebas de la historia y contribuyo asi enormemente al cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la de independencia del mundo.
					
					  Refirio que el enriquecio incesantemente la idea Juche, la del Songun, con los principios profundos y contenidos originales conforme a la nueva demanda de la practica revolucionaria de la epoca actual y convirtio a Corea como potencia ideo-politica y militar muy dignificada.
					
					  Finalizo que todos los militantes del partido, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y los habitantes deben glorificar para siempre la idea revolucionaria del Dirigente y sus hazanas enalteciendolo de generacion en generacion con la noble obligacion moral y firme conviccion de que el vive siempre en el pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Premier recorre la granja cooperativa de Samjigang
articles.content:
Premier recorre la granja cooperativa de Samjigang
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- El premier coreano Choe Yong Rim averiguo el dia 29 en el terreno las inminentes faenas agricolas de la Granja Cooperativa de Samjigang del distrito de Jaeryong de la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur.
					Esta granja en emulacion socialista con las otras ejemplares de la epoca del Songun alcanzo muchos exitos en su lucha por asentar sobre la base cientifica la produccion agricola conforme al proposito del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					Dando vueltas por las parcelas de la tercera brigada de produccion agricola, el premier se cercioro del estado de la arada de arrozal, la siembra en el semillero de arroz y otras faenas.
					
					Enfatizo que esta granja donde estan grabadas las hazanas de direccion de los Grandes Hombres del monte Paektu debe elevar el rendimiento por hectarea al realizar todas las faenas de modo cientifico-tecnico.
					
					En este ano del centenario de natalicio del Presidente Kim Il Sung, la granja debe exaltar el honor de la unidad ejemplar de la epoca del Songun con la mayor produccion de cereales, dijo y asigno las tareas a las unidades relacionadas para ayudarla.

articles.title: Ro Su Hui visita varios lugares
articles.content:
Ro Su Hui visita varios lugares
Pyongyang, 30 de marzo (ACNC) -- Ro Su Hui, vicepresidente de la direccion surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP), visito el dia 29 la Granja Fruticola Combinada Taedonggang, el Combinado de Procesamiento de Frutas Taedonggang y la Planta de Tortugas de Agua Dulce Taedonggang.
					El visitante recorrio las llanuras, rutas y viviendas de la Granja y las cadenas de produccion de las fabricas en alto nivel cientifico.
					
					El Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional   Kim Jong Il presto profunda atencion al problema alimentario del pueblo, dijo y anadio que en este mundo no hay otro lider como el.
					
					Al termino de la visita, firmo el libro de visitas.
					
					Anteriormente, Ro se reunio con los ex presos de largas condenas no abjurados, visito el Cementerio de Martires Patrioticos y otros lugares y presencio la funcion de la Banda Samjiyon del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae.
